title: Why mosquitoes buzz in peoples ears
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: A delightful children’s animation that is based on an African folktale. The story is about the disaster that can occur when people tell tall-tales. Adaptation by Gene Deitch of an award winning book written by Verna Aardema.
